settings.title: 设置
settings.loginOptionalDescription: Login is optional. You can use MCP Router without an account, though some features may be limited.

agents.title: 代理
agents.packageManagerOverlayDescription: Agents require package managers to run MCP 服务器. The following package managers need to be installed:
agents.restartInstructions: 请重启应用以应用环境变量变更。

agents.shareConfirmDescription: 分享前请检查设置并撰写说明
agents.deployConfirmDescription: 检查代理设置并配置部署选项
agents.publicDeploy: 公开部署（通过链接分享）
agents.publicDeployDescription: When enabled, your agent will be publicly accessible via a 分享 link. You'll earn 1 credit each time someone uses your shared agent.

loginRequired.featureDescription: You need to be logged in to use this feature. Please go to Settings to 日志 in, or continue with limited functionality.

importFromJson.title: 导入 from JSON
importFromJson.description: 导入 MCP 服务器 from a JSON 配置 file
importFromJson.errorInvalidJson: 提供的内容不是有效的 JSON。

importFromJson.errorEmptyMcpServers: 'mcpServers' 对象中至少应包含一个服务器。

importFromJson.errorInvalidArgs: 服务器 '{{serverName}}' 的 'args' 无效，必须是数组。
importFromJson.errorFailedImport: 从 JSON 导入服务器失败。
importFromJson.successImport: 成功导入 {{count}} 个服务器。
importFromJson.partialSuccess: 部分成功：导入 {{success}} 个服务器，{{fail}} 个失败。
